summary: The diff shows modifications to backend (main.mo) and frontend hook (useGiftPacks.ts) files. The backend changes are truncated, limiting verification of REQ-3. The frontend hook shows implementation of data fetching logic for REQ-2. However, there is no evidence of modifications to CatalogPage.tsx, which is the primary target for REQ-1.

missing_requirements.requirement: Debug and fix the issue preventing gift pack tiles from rendering on the catalog/browse page (CatalogPage.tsx). Investigate data fetching, filtering logic, and component rendering to identify why tiles are not displaying.
missing_requirements.reason: CatalogPage.tsx is not present in the modified files list. The requirement specifically mentions investigating and fixing issues in this file, but no changes to it are shown in the diff.
